title: Setup development environment documentation
description: Create docs/development.md with: environment setup (pyenv/venv), dependency installation, running tests, code quality checks, building docs, and troubleshooting guide for contributors.

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Created comprehensive development environment documentation:

**Content:**
- Prerequisites: Python 3.10+, Poetry, Git
- Environment setup: pyenv, Poetry installation, repo cloning, dependency installation
- Development workflow: testing, code quality, pre-commit hooks, building, docs, updates, cleaning
- Project structure overview
- Troubleshooting: Poetry, dependencies, pre-commit, type checking, test failures
- Code style guidelines: Python style (88 char, 4 spaces, type hints, Google docstrings)
- Commit message format (conventional commits with Gira reference)
- Branch naming conventions
- IDE setup: VS Code (recommended extensions), PyCharm
- Next steps for contributors including CLA link

**Commands documented:**
- All Makefile commands with both make and Poetry alternatives
- Pre-commit hook installation and usage
- Dependency management and updates
- Build and clean operations

Documentation provides complete onboarding for new contributors.
